languages.text: "Я догадывалась, что в этом мире тебя возбуждает только работа. Но называть слежку за преступниками "приятным занятием"... то еще извращение".

traits.locale_text: "Я догадывалась, что в этом мире тебя возбуждает только работа. Но называть слежку за преступниками "приятным занятием"... то еще извращение".

languages.text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."
languages.original_text: "Я догадывалась, что в этом мире тебя возбуждает только работа. Но называть слежку за преступниками "приятным занятием"... то еще извращение".

traits.locale_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."
"I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."
"I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."
"I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."
"I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."
"I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."

languages.text: 「アンタが人生で熱中できるのは仕事くらいだろうとは思っていたわ。でも、犯罪者を追うのが『快感』だなんてね。それはそれで珍しい類の倒錯よ」
languages.original_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."

traits.locale_text: 「アンタが人生で熱中できるのは仕事くらいだろうとは思っていたわ。でも、犯罪者を追うのが『快感』だなんてね。それはそれで珍しい類の倒錯よ」

languages.text: "Ich hatte schon vermutet, dass Euch in diesem Leben nur eines in Wallung bringt: Eure Arbeit. Aber die Jagd auf Verbrecher 'befriedigend' zu nennen, das ist schon eine seltene Perversion."
languages.original_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hatte schon vermutet, dass Euch in diesem Leben nur eines in Wallung bringt: Eure Arbeit. Aber die Jagd auf Verbrecher 'befriedigend' zu nennen, das ist schon eine seltene Perversion."

languages.text: « Je me disais bien que votre travail était la seule chose que vous aimiez dans la vie, mais dire que la traque de criminels vous procure du plaisir, c'est un genre très particulier de perversion. »
languages.original_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."

traits.locale_text: « Je me disais bien que votre travail était la seule chose que vous aimiez dans la vie, mais dire que la traque de criminels vous procure du plaisir, c'est un genre très particulier de perversion. »

languages.text: «Sospechaba que su trabajo era lo único que le excitaba en esta vida. Pero encontrar "placentero" perseguir criminales me parece una perversión muy poco habitual».
languages.original_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."

traits.locale_text: «Sospechaba que su trabajo era lo único que le excitaba en esta vida. Pero encontrar "placentero" perseguir criminales me parece una perversión muy poco habitual».

languages.text: “我不禁觉得，你这辈子唯一的动力就是工作。不过，你居然说追查罪犯的踪迹是件‘令人愉悦’的事情，这种反常行为确实相当罕见。”
languages.original_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."

traits.locale_text: “我不禁觉得，你这辈子唯一的动力就是工作。不过，你居然说追查罪犯的踪迹是件‘令人愉悦’的事情，这种反常行为确实相当罕见。”

languages.text: "Seni hayata bağlayan tek şey işin, o belli ama iz sürmeyi 'tatmin edici' bulmak bambaşka bir seviye."
languages.original_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."

traits.locale_text: "Seni hayata bağlayan tek şey işin, o belli ama iz sürmeyi 'tatmin edici' bulmak bambaşka bir seviye."

languages.original_text: "I suspected that the only thing that gets you going in this life was your job. But to call tracking down criminals 'pleasurable' is a rare kind of perversion."
